name: CubeZRiddle
description:
CubeZRiddle is a puzzle platformer created for the Epic MegaJam 2021.

 The game is a mix between a platformer and a puzzle game. Your goal is to solve puzzles without running out of floor spaces to reach your destination.

Created in UE5 early access.

------

Known Bugs: 

Secret Level Count at Final Screen doesn't register second secret level. Fixed Version will be uploaded after 2021 Epic MegaJam Voting (sadly 2 min to late for the Bugfix upload..)
